```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pkg <- c("tidyr", "dplyr", "ggplot2", 
  "knitr", "rmarkdown", "readr", 
  "DT","devtools")

new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages())]

if (length(new.pkg)) {
  install.packages(new.pkg, repos = "http://cran.rstudio.com")
}

lapply(pkg, library, character.only = TRUE)
```
